All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdjacencyMatrixLoader
This class is responsible for converting a MWCP benchmark instance (in the format of DIMACS-W(ASCII Undirected)) to an adjacency matrix.
CliqueValidation
This class is for testing purposes.
CMCS
This class implements the Conditional Markov Chain Search framework.
EvaluateCMCS
Class which evaluates a CMCS configuration on a set of DIMACS-W benchmark instances.
Heuristic
Heuristic interface which is implemented by any heuristic component.
HillClimber1
This class implements the "HillClimber1" heuristic component.
HillClimber2
This class implements the "HillClimber2" heuristic component.
InstancesLoader
This class is responsible for loading a set of MWCP benchmark instances by passing every instance in a specific file path to the "AdjacencyMatrixLoader" to load one instance at a time.
Main
This program is designed to solve the Maximum Weighted Clique Problem (MWCP) using the Conditional Markov Chain Search (CMCS) framework and Simulated Annealing (SA) algorithm for optimizing CMCS configurations.
Mutator1
This class implements the "Mutator1" heuristic.
Mutator2
This class implements the "Mutator2" heuristic.
Mutator3
This class implements the "Mutator3" heuristic.
Mutator4
This class implements the "Mutator4" heuristic.
ObjectiveFunctionMWCP
This class calculates the objective value of MWCP solutions.
ObjectiveFunctionSA
This class implements an objective function for Simulated Annealing(SA) for optimizing CMCS configurations.
SimulatedAnnealing
A class implementing Simulated Annealing(SA) algorithm for optimizing CMCS configuration.
TransitionMatrixLoader
This class is responsible for loading a CMCS configuration from a text file.
